name: places/ChIJMdewuaQZ2jERwwfStN_krnM/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNZN09LTXd3RRAB
text: {'text': 'First time at the Gem Museum! It’s an eye-opening experience. Every girl loves bling bling gemstones~ learned a lot from our guide YY today! Decided to open one of the geodes stones, and it was so fun!! You can see it in my video!', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': 'First time at the Gem Museum! It’s an eye-opening experience. Every girl loves bling bling gemstones~ learned a lot from our guide YY today! Decided to open one of the geodes stones, and it was so fun!! You can see it in my video!', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJMdewuaQZ2jERwwfStN_krnM/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURYcjd5dXl3RRAB
text: {'text': 'The Gem Museum is a true hidden gem! Opened by Mr. Tay and his family out of passion, this family-run spot offers a fascinating look at a wide variety of stones from around the world, including pieces from Mr. Tay’s adventures in Africa, Russia, and Indonesia. The staff is incredibly friendly, making it a welcoming place to explore and learn. Highly recommend for anyone interested in gemstones and their stories!', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJMdewuaQZ2jERwwfStN_krnM/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUNYMDd1WllBEAE
places/ChIJMdewuaQZ2jERwwfStN_krnM/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNncDlUNDFRRRAB
text: {'text': 'Thank you Jo for the very informative and interesting tour. Jo is very patience with kids and explained the "mine to gem" process so well. The tour is well organised and the highlight is definitely the breaking of geodes. Great experience :)', 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': 'Thank you Jo for the very informative and interesting tour. Jo is very patience with kids and explained the "mine to gem" process so well. The tour is well organised and the highlight is definitely the breaking of geodes. Great experience :)', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJMdewuaQZ2jERwwfStN_krnM/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUNienFHOFhnEAE
text: {'text': 'I wanted to give this place 99999+1 stars. This place is, put simply, AMAZING. I have come here over 6 times, and i will come again. The staff are helpful and fun, they teach you all about the gemstones. The collection of gems here is beautiful, and everyone here is friendly. Regardless if you are a gem collector or just a passer-by, this place is a must-go. They have a wide range of affordable amazing gemstones here, too. They have a variety of events, such as the Night at the Museum, that blew my mind. Black Opals here are pretty!!!! Thank you, Gem Museum! This place is seriously underrated. Mr Tay Kunming also helped answer questions for my school project. I love this place.', 'languageCode': 'en'}
